title: Scott Weiland & The Wildabouts Tickets: CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Their Prices on Scott Weiland & The Wildabouts Concert Tickets for their 2015 Tour Dates
text:
Scott Weiland & The Wildabouts concert tickets for their 2015 tour dates are on sale now for cities like Las Vegas, Chandler, and Louisville. Trusted secondary ticket market provider CapitalCityTickets.com is providing The Wildabouts fans with a promo code CITY5 to save an additional 5% on all orders.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a vast selection of Scott Weiland & The Wildabouts concert tickets at affordable prices. Scott Weiland & The Wildabouts are hitting the road in 2015 and kicking it all off on October 28th in Hermosa Beach, CA.
The band will be out in support of their new album, Blaster. More dates to be announced in the future.
